WebGPU-BLAS Example

This example computes matrix-matrix multiplication (sgemm) using WebGPU, future web standard.

As of 2020, you need a beta version web browser, such as Chrome Canary, and enable webgpu feature flag (open chrome://flags/#enable-unsafe-webgpu ).

WebGPU of this browser:

Created by @milhidaka Github
